title: Amy Winehouse - Back To Black (Deluxe Edition)
description:
&#039;Back To Black&#039; was the second studio album by English singer-songwriter Amy Winehouse, released by Island Records in October 2006. The album contains the singles &#039;Rehab&#039;, &#039;You Know I&#039;m No Good&#039;, &#039;Back to Black&#039;, and &#039;Tears Dry On Their Own&#039;. During its first two weeks on sale, Back to Black sold a total of 70,784 copies in the UK, including 43,021 in its first week. By the end of the year, the album had been certified platinum. To date, the album has sold more than 1,478,182 copies in the UK [reaching the million mark on June 13th 2007], and for the week ending January 27th 2007, sold 30,000 copies more than any other album. It achieved its peak of number one on the UK Albums Chart for the week ending January 20, 2007, and with sales of more than 1,180,479 is currently the UK&#039;s biggest-selling album of 2007.

The album was reissued as a Deluxe Edition on November 5th 2007 in the UK. The Deluxe Edition features the original studio album, as well as a bonus disc including various b-sides, rare, and live tracks, including the single &#039;Valerie&#039; which was originally only available on Mark Ronson&#039;s &#039;Version&#039; album. It has not been announced whether or not the Deluxe Edition will be released outside of the United Kingdom.

CD1 Tracks:
01 Rehab
02 You Know Im No Good
03 Me And Mr Jones
04 Just Friends
05 Back To Black
06 Love Is A Losing Game
07 Tears Dry On Their Own
08 Wake Up Alone
09 Some Unholy War
10 He Can Only Hold Her
11 Addicted

CD2 Tracks:
01 Valerie
02 Cupid [Deluxe Edition Version]
03 Monkey Man
04 To Know Him Is To Love Him [Napster Live]
05 Hey Little Rich Girl [Ft. Zalon And Ade]
06 You&#039;re Wondering Now
07 Some Unholy War
08 Love Is A Losing Game [Original Demo]


Released :	4 October 2006 (2006-10-04)
Recorded: 	2006
Genre: 	Soul, jazz, R&B, blues
Length: 	34:55 (UK)
Label: 	Island
Producer: 	Mark Ronson, Salaam Remi
